topic.title: make cash online?do you?
topic.body:
Telegram channel: https://t.me/mkcsh

Official website: http://mkcash.com   

We welcome you to actively and freely discuss the topics related to digital currency and blockchain. It is strictly forbidden to gossip and influence others! 2. No advertising is allowed. Please contact the group leader for any matters that need to be publicized. The advertiser will be listed in the blacklist of blockchain forum, and all groups will be kicked out forever! 3. Do not talk about politics, religion, and gambling.

Pi is a new digital currency being developed by a group of Stanford PhDs. For a limited time, you can join the beta to earn Pi and help grow the network. To join Pi, follow this link https://minepi.com/titanlee and use my username (titanlee) as your invitation code.




Pi هو العملة الرقمية الجديدة التي يتم تطويرها من قبل مجموعه من ستانفورد PhDs. لفتره محدوده ، يمكنك الانضمام إلى بيتا لكسب Pi والمساعدة في نمو الشبكة. للانضمام إلى Pi ، اتبع هذا الرابط https://minepi.com/titanlee واستخدم اسم المستخدم الخاص بي (titanlee)
